short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension to help ease my suffering when I struggle to read giant numbers without any commas, such as 100000000.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome browser extension to help me read large, especially unformatted numbers, because people are stupid and do not format their numbers correctly to make reading them easier. (they do 1000000000 instead of 1,000,000,000)
